sidebar.incidentsDescription: Shows the dangerousness for each street segment by analyzing the location and severity of incidents. Zoom in to see each incident.
sidebar.surfaceQualityDescription: Shows the quality of the road / bike lane surface.
sidebar.relativeSpeedDescription: Shows the average speed for each street segments (relative to the speed of the individual bicyclists).
sidebar.stopTimesDescription: Shows the average stop times for each intersection.
sidebar.boxAnalysisDescription: Draw a shape on the map to see what bike rides went through it. Click on the shape to draw a new one.
sidebar.toolsDescription: Upload a ride to analyze it (drag the file on the map).

draw.polygonEnd: Click first point to close this shape.
